item.description:
We're making a road trip to WEBS in Northhampton MA!!!

After discussion on Sunday, we've decided that we'll meet at the Park and Ride on 89 and 3A in Bow near Grappone at 9:00 am on Saturday the 13th. (Info on the Park and Ride location is at http://www.nh.gov/dot...) For those of you who already have full cars and have made their arrangements, you don't need to meet up with us. PLEASE RSVP!!! I don't want to leave anyone behind because I didn't know you were coming. Please check the website below if you are driving to print out directions, but I will try to bring a couple of copies with me. I will have a couple of spaces in my car and I believe Paula will as well. If you have questions, please let me know.

For directions and more information, their website is
www.yarn.com

Email Denise if you have questions.
item.name: WEBS Field Trip
